name: detaxizer-contamination-removal
title: Genomic Sequence Decontamination
description: Identifies and removes taxonomic contaminants from genomic data using Kraken2 and bbduk. Supports both short and long-read sequencing with optional blastn validation for metagenomics and eDNA analysis. Samplesheet format: `sample,fastq_1,fastq_2`
content:
Detaxizer - Genomic Sequence Decontamination

Bioinformatics pipeline for identifying and optionally removing specific taxonomic sequences from genomic datasets. Designed for decontamination of metagenomic, microbiome, and eDNA samples with default focus on removing human contamination, but configurable for any target taxon.

What is Detaxizer?

Detaxizer provides comprehensive taxonomic filtering to clean genomic datasets before downstream analysis, ensuring that contaminating sequences (such as host DNA) don't interfere with microbial or environmental studies.

Key Features

  • Multi-Platform Support: Short-read and long-read sequencing
  • Multiple Classifiers: Kraken2 and bbduk for taxonomic assignment
  • Optional Validation: blastn confirmation of identified taxa
  • Quality Control: FastQC and fastp preprocessing
  • Flexible Filtering: Remove any target taxon, not just human
  • Downstream Compatible: Generates samplesheets for nf-core pipelines

Pipeline Workflow

  1. Quality Assessment: FastQC evaluation of raw reads
  2. Optional Preprocessing: fastp for quality trimming and filtering
  3. Taxonomic Classification: Kraken2 and/or bbduk for sequence assignment
  4. Optional Validation: blastn verification of classifications
  5. Sequence Filtering: Remove reads matching target taxa
  6. Report Generation: Summary statistics and taxonomic profiles
  7. Quality Control: MultiQC report with comprehensive metrics

Scientific Applications

  • Metagenomics: Remove host contamination from microbiome samples
  • Environmental DNA: Clean eDNA datasets of unwanted species
  • Clinical Samples: Remove human reads from pathogen sequencing
  • Microbial Studies: Prepare datasets for species-specific analysis
  • Quality Control: Taxonomic profiling and contamination assessment

Advantages

  • Flexible Configuration: Target any taxon for removal
  • Validation Options: Optional blastn for high-confidence filtering
  • Preserves Data: Option to identify without removing
  • Comprehensive Reports: Detailed taxonomic profiles generated
  • Integration Ready: Creates compatible inputs for other pipelines

Input Requirements

  • FASTQ Files: Short or long-read sequencing data
  • Sample Sheet: CSV with sample information
  • Kraken2 Database: For taxonomic classification
  • Optional: BLAST database for validation

Main Outputs

  • Cleaned FASTQ Files: Decontaminated sequence reads
  • Taxonomic Reports: Kraken2 classification results
  • Removed Sequences: Identified contaminating reads
  • Summary Statistics: Contamination levels and filtering metrics
  • QC Reports: MultiQC comprehensive quality assessment
  • Downstream Samplesheets: Ready for other nf-core pipelines

Perfect for: Metagenomics • Microbiome • eDNA • Decontamination • Quality Control
